item.title: Ditch Cmd for Powershell
item.author: contact@saggiehaim.net (Saggie Haim)
item.description: When I started to learn PowerShell, I said to myself “I’m going to do everything in PowerShell”. In the beginning, the simpler stuff like unlocking a locked-out account, or resetting a password, took me 5 minutes. I had to google how to do it on PowerShell, understand what I’m reading and testing it before I’m deleting all organization users. With the practice and learning, things become much better and most important, faster.
